name: Schema Name Badge
description:
Connecting with other attendees is one of the most valuable parts of participating in a conference. At a virtual event, that can be a bit harder to do—so that’s why we created this fun name badge activity. They tell everyone who you are, what you’re into, and what you want to talk about.


Don’t forget to publish your name badge as a remix and share an image on Twitter with the hashtag #Schema2021!
